NK001(ka)029:0: khyim pa rjes su 'dzin pa so sor thar pa'i
NK001(ka)029:1: sdom pa'i cho ga thar lam rab gsal zhes bya
NK001(ka)029:3: rnam grol byang chub mchog brnyes nas //
NK001(ka)029:4: thugs rjes gdul bya skal pa bzhin //
NK001(ka)029:5: 'dul mdzad thams cad mkhyen de la //
NK001(ka)029:6: dngos po kun gyis phyag bagyi'o //
NK001(ka)029:7: tshul khrims gru gzings la brten nas //
NK001(ka)029:8: myang 'das rin chen gling mchog tu //
NK001(ka)029:9: bgrod byed ma smad cho ga'i khrigs //
NK001(ka)029:10: nyung gsal 'jug bde nyid du spel //
NK001(ka)029:11: 'dir skyabs 'gro'i sdom pa don du gnyen ba dag 'ongs pa na /
NK001(ka)029:12: gnas gtsang mar thub pa chen po'i sku gzugs sogs
NK001(ka)029:13: dkon mchog gi rten dang mchod pa ci 'byor pa
NK001(ka)029:15: bla ma stan mtho ba la 'dug pa'i drung du
NK001(ka)029:16: slob mas rten dang bla ma la phyag gsum gsum
NK001(ka)029:17: byas nas tsog pu'am pus mo btsugs thal mo sbyar
NK001(ka)029:21: rnyed par dka' ba dal 'byor gyi rten khyad par can rnye. /
NK001(ka)029:22: mjal bar dka' ba sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dang mjal /
NK001(ka)029:23: bdag legs su 'dod pa'i skye bo dag gis don du gnyer bya ni /
NK001(ka)029:24: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la nan tan snying por bya ba nyid yin la /
NK001(ka)029:25: de la yon tan thams cad kyi gzhi tshul khrims kyi bslab pa la thog mar bslab dgos shing /
NK001(ka)029:26: de'i rtsa ba yang skyabs su 'gro ba'i sdom pa nyid la rag las pa yin te /
NK001(ka)029:28: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro ba //
NK001(ka)029:30: zhes gsungs pas phan yon shin tu che ba yin /
NK001(ka)029:31: . yang bla ma'i rjes su bzlos nas blangs na
NK001(ka)029:32: ngo tsha khrel yod kyi rten sogs dgos pa khyad
NK001(ka)029:33: par can yod pas 'di'i rjes zlos mdzo. /
NK001(ka)029:35: chos 'brel med na btsun pa zhes dang /
NK001(ka)029:42: sangs rgyas la skyabs su- mchi'o //
NK001(ka)029:43: 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog /
NK001(ka)029:44: chos la tshogs rnams kyi mchog /
NK001(ka)029:45: dge 'dun la bdag dus 'di nas bzung ste /
NK001(ka)029:46: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du skyabs gsum 'dzin pa'i dge bsnyen du slob dpon gyis bzung du gsol /
NK001(ka)029:47: zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du barjoda nas /
NK001(ka)029:53: . nas bslab bya bshad par bya ste /
NK001(ka)029:54: . ltar skyabs 'gro'i sdom pa thob pa tsam gyis mi chog /
NK001(ka)029:56: bslab bya'i chos de yang ji lta bu yin snyam na /
NK001(ka)029:57: dgag pa'i bslab bya gsum dang /
NK001(ka)029:58: sgrub pa'i bslab bya gsum dang /
NK001(ka)029:59: cha mthun gyi bslab bya gsum ste dagu'o //
NK001(ka)029:61: sangs rgyas la skyabs su song nas 'jig rten pa'i lha la skyabs 'gro mi bya /
NK001(ka)029:62: chos la skyabs su song nas sems can la gnod 'tshe mi bya /
NK001(ka)029:63: dge 'dun la skyabs su song nas mu stegs can la mi brten pa'o //
NK001(ka)029:64: . yang bod 'dir mu-stegs dngos su mi 'byung yang
NK001(ka)029:65: sdig can gyi grogs de dang 'dra bas mi brten
NK001(ka)029:67: sangs rgyas la skyabs su song nas bde bar gshegs
NK001(ka)029:68: pa'i sku gzugs kyi rten tha na sats+tsha'i chag dum
NK001(ka)029:69: yan chad la sangs rgyas dngos kyi 'du shes bzhag
NK001(ka)029:70: nas phyag mchod bkur sti sogs gus par bye. /
NK001(ka)029:71: chos la skyabs su song nas chos dkon mchog gi
NK001(ka)029:72: rten gsung rab kyi rten tha na yig 'bru gcig
NK001(ka)029:73: yan chad la chos dkon mchog dngos kyi 'du shes
NK001(ka)029:74: bzhag nas gus 'dud bkur sti sogs snga ma ltar
NK001(ka)029:75: bya'o // dge 'dun la skyabs su song nas dge
NK001(ka)029:76: 'dun dkon mchog gi rten rab tu byung ba nas
NK001(ka)029:77: tha na lhan pa ser po btab pa yan la
NK001(ka)029:78: dge 'dun dkon mchog dngos kyi 'du shes bzhag nas
NK001(ka)029:79: gus 'dud bkur sti sogs sngar ltar bya'o //
NK001(ka)029:81: dus rtag tu dkon mchog mchod pa la brtson par
NK001(ka)029:82: bya ste tha na ci za ci 'thung gi phud
NK001(ka)029:84: nang nub sogs su skyabs 'gro bzla ba la brtson pa dang /
NK001(ka)029:85: skyes bu dam pa la brten nas chos kyi rjes
NK001(ka)029:86: su 'jug cing chos dang mthun pa'i spyod pa la
NK001(ka)029:87: bslab par bya'o // . lta bu'i bslab bya rnams
NK001(ka)029:88: yid la bzung ste dran shes dang ldan pas dus
NK001(ka)029:89: rtag tu slob par gyis shig /
NK001(ka)029:92: bsngo ba dang smon lam byas nas rang gi gnas su gtang ngo //
NK001(ka)029:93: skyabs 'gro'i sdom pa sbyin pa'i cho ga'o ////
NK001(ka)029:95: stobs bcu'i stobs kyis bdud bcom nas //
NK001(ka)029:96: thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa //
NK001(ka)029:97: zas gtsang sras la gus btud nas //
NK001(ka)029:98: dge bsnyen sdom pa'i cho ga bshad //
NK001(ka)029:99: 'dir yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa'i cho ga 'chad pa la //
NK001(ka)029:100: ga mar sdom pa len pa'i tshul /
NK001(ka)029:101: bar du mi nyams par bsrung ba'i tshul /
NK001(ka)029:102: mthar nyams na phyir bcos pa'i tshul /
NK001(ka)029:103: sdom pa'i phan yon bshad pa dang bzhi las /
NK001(ka)029:105: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du mchod pa ci 'byor pa bshams /
NK001(ka)029:106: slob dpon khri stan la 'khod pa'i mdud du bsgrub
NK001(ka)029:107: byas rten dang bla ma la phyag gsum gsum byas
NK001(ka)029:108: nas tsog pu'am pus btsugs kyis thal mo sbyar bas
NK001(ka)029:109: 'dug pa la / 'o rnyed par dka' ba dal 'byor gyi rten khyad par can rnye. /
NK001(ka)029:110: mjal bar dka' ba sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dang mjal /
NK001(ka)029:111: bdag legs su 'dod pa'i skye bo rnams kyis don
NK001(ka)029:112: du gnyen bya ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la
NK001(ka)029:113: nan tan snying por bya ba nyid yin la /
NK001(ka)029:114: de la yon tan thams cad kyi gzhi tshul khrims kyi bslab pa la thog mar bslab dgos shing /
NK001(ka)029:115: . yang so sor thar pa gzhir bzhag gi dbang
NK001(ka)029:116: du byas na sdom pa rigs bdun nam brgyad du
NK001(ka)029:117: gsungs pa'i nang nas skyabs 'gro nas yongs rdzogs kyi
NK001(ka)029:119: 'dir yongs rdzogs dge bsnyen gyi dngos por sgrub pa yin pas /
NK001(ka)029:120: sems can thams cad kyi don du sangs rgyas thob par bya /
NK001(ka)029:121: de'i phyir du dge bsnyen yongs rdzogs kyi bslab pa
NK001(ka)029:122: blangs nas bsrung snyam pas 'di'i rjes zlos gyis shig
NK001(ka)029:124: btsun pa'am slob dpon dgongs gsol dang /
NK001(ka)029:126: dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o'i bar dang /
NK001(ka)029:127: bdag dus 'di nas bzung ste ji sri.- 'tsho'i bar
NK001(ka)029:128: du dge bsnyen du btsun pa'am slob dpon gyis bzung
NK001(ka)029:129: du gsol / zhes lan gsum dang thabs legs bya /
NK001(ka)029:130: . ltar khyod kyis dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa thob nas bsrung dgos pas /
NK001(ka)029:131: bsrung tshul kyang spang bya lnga po 'di yid kyi sgo nas spang /
NK001(ka)029:132: lus ngag gi sgo nas slar log par bye. /
NK001(ka)029:133: . yang sngon gyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyi rjes
NK001(ka)029:134: su 'brangs nas bsrung snyam pa gyis la 'di'i rjes
NK001(ka)029:135: zlos gyis zhes brda sbyar la /
NK001(ka)029:137: ji ltar sngon gyis 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de
NK001(ka)029:138: dag gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa
NK001(ka)029:139: spangs te / srog gcod pa las slar log pa de bzhin du /
NK001(ka)029:140: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang /
NK001(ka)029:141: dus 'di nas bzung ste ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te /
NK001(ka)029:142: srog gcod pa las slar log par bagyi'o //
NK001(ka)029:143: yan lag dang po 'dis bdag 'phags pa dgra bcom
NK001(ka)029:144: pa de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su slob
NK001(ka)029:147: gzhan yang sngon gyi 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de
NK001(ka)029:148: dag gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ma byin par
NK001(ka)029:149: len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /
NK001(ka)029:154: bag med pa'i gnas spangs te /
NK001(ka)029:156: bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las slar log pa de bzhin du /
NK001(ka)029:157: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang /
NK001(ka)029:158: dus 'di nas bzung ste ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ma byin par len pa dang /
NK001(ka)029:159: zhes pa nas bag med pa'i gnas las slar log par bagyi'o //
NK001(ka)029:160: yan lag lnga pa 'dis bdag 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gi bslab pa la /
NK001(ka)029:162: rjes su bgyid do'i bar lan gcig barjo. /
NK001(ka)029:163: . ltar khyod kyis yongs rdzogs dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa len ba'i cho ga dngos dang /
NK001(ka)029:164: bslab pa barjoda pa gnyis kyi sgo nas legs par thob pa yin pas /
NK001(ka)029:165: de la brten nas rang gzhan gyi don rgya chen po 'grub par gyis shig /
NK001(ka)029:166: ces barjoda nas bsngo ba bya'o //
NK001(ka)029:167: gnyis pa bar du mi nyams par bsrung ba'i tshul ni bslab bya shes pa la rag las pas /
NK001(ka)029:168: de nyid 'chad par 'dod na thog mar sdom pa
NK001(ka)029:169: gang dang gang len kyang skyabs 'gro rtsom byed du
NK001(ka)029:170: dgos pas skyabs 'gro'i bslab bya 'di rnams la bslab
NK001(ka)029:171: dgos / zhes skyabs sdom gyi cho gar smos pa'i bslab bya rnams barjoda nas /
NK001(ka)029:172: dge bsnyen gyi bslab bya la dngos kyi spang bya yan lag lnga dang /
NK001(ka)029:173: phyogs mthun gyi bslab bya dang /
NK001(ka)029:174: thabs mkhas kyi sgo las nyes med dang gsum /
NK001(ka)029:175: dang po yan lag lnga las /
NK001(ka)029:176: srog gcod ni gzhi mi'am mir chags pa la der 'du shes pa /
NK001(ka)029:179: sbyor ba mtshon brtsams pa la sogs pa /
NK001(ka)029:180: mthar thug sbyor ba brtsams ma thag pa'am gzhan gyis
NK001(ka)029:181: tshe yang rung gsod pa bo bdag nyid ma shi
NK001(ka)029:182: ba'i snga rol du pha rol po srog dang bral
NK001(ka)029:184: ma byin par len pa ni /
NK001(ka)029:185: gzhi gzhan gyis bdag gir bzung ba'i dngos po gser
NK001(ka)029:186: zho phyed kyi rin thang tshang ba yan chad der
NK001(ka)029:187: 'du shes pa / kun slong chags pa /
NK001(ka)029:189: sbyor ba mathu'am g.yo dang 'jab bus gnas nas spos pa /
NK001(ka)029:190: mthar thug thob blo skyes pas yan lag rdzogs pa'o //
NK001(ka)029:192: gzhi rang gi chung ma ma yin pa'i bud med rus bdun brgyud las ma 'das pa dang /
NK001(ka)029:193: sdom pa dang pha ma sogs kyis bsrung ba dang /
NK001(ka)029:194: gzhan gyi gla rngan ma sbyangs pa dang /
NK001(ka)029:195: nang bu can sogs yul dang /
NK001(ka)029:196: dus ma yin pa nyin mo sogs dang /
NK001(ka)029:197: gnas ma yin pa pha ma dang dkon mchog la sogs pa'i gnas dang /
NK001(ka)029:198: yan lag ma yin pa kha dang gshang sgo la sogs pa rnams so //
NK001(ka)029:201: sbyor ba bcug reg la sogs pas 'khrig pa /
NK001(ka)029:202: mthar thug bde ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba
NK001(ka)029:203: sred pas bdag gir byas pas yan lag rdzogs pa'o
NK001(ka)029:205: gzhi smra shes don go'i mi rang las gzhan pa la /
NK001(ka)029:206: bden bzhi'i don rtogs pa sogs yon tan gong ma dang /
NK001(ka)029:207: lha klu la sogs pa mthong ngo zhes pa rnams so //
NK001(ka)029:208: kun slong dug gsum gang rung las gti mug gtso bor gyur pa'o //
NK001(ka)029:209: bsam pa mngon shes rdzu 'phrul sogs med par shes
NK001(ka)029:210: bzhin du gzhan bslu sems kyis yod par 'du shes
NK001(ka)029:211: bsgyur ba / sbyor ba lus ngag gi rnam rig tu thon pas brda sprod pa /
NK001(ka)029:212: mthar thug smras pa'i yul de la brda 'phrod pas yan lag rdzogs pa'o //
NK001(ka)029:214: gzhi nas dang 'bras la sogs pa 'bru dang /
NK001(ka)029:217: bur sbrang gi khu ba sogs las byas pa'i myos par 'gyur pa /
NK001(ka)029:218: kun slong sred pa te chags pa'o //
NK001(ka)029:219: bsam pa ni bag med par 'thung bar sems pa'o //
NK001(ka)029:220: sbyor ba ni chang 'thung ba lus ngag gi las so //
NK001(ka)029:221: mthar thug myos par gyur pa na yan lag rdzogs pa'o //
NK001(ka)029:222: gzhan yang rtsa ba bzhir ma longs pa la phra mo zhes btags pa ste /
NK001(ka)029:223: mi'am mir chags pa ma yin pa dud 'gro la sogs pa bsad pa dang /
NK001(ka)029:224: bsad bya mi'am mir chags kyang bsad bya ma shi ba'i gong du 'gyo. pa sogs dang /
NK001(ka)029:225: ma byin len rin thang ma rdzogs pa dang /
NK001(ka)029:226: log g.yem rang nyid kyis sam spyad par mi bzod pa'i yul las khu ba phyung ba dang /
NK001(ka)029:227: rdzun smra ni mi chos bla ma smra ba ma yin pa rnams so //
NK001(ka)029:229: mi dge ba bcu las gong gi bzhi po ma gtogs pa'i lhag ma drug ste /
NK001(ka)029:230: phra ma ni dbyen tshig smra ba'o //
NK001(ka)029:231: tshig rtsub ni gzhan gyi gnad du phog pa'o //
NK001(ka)029:232: bkyal pa ni bre mo dang klu dang bstan bcos ngan pa smra ba'o //
NK001(ka)029:233: brnab sems ni gzhan gyi rdzas la thob 'dod bskyed pa'o //
NK001(ka)029:234: gnod sems ni gzhan la gsod cing brdeg par sems pa sogs so //
NK001(ka)029:235: log lta ni las 'bras mi bden par lta ba'o //
NK001(ka)029:236: drug po 'di dag kyang mi dge ba'i las lam
NK001(ka)029:237: du rdzogs pa la gzhi kun slong 'du shes sbyor
NK001(ka)029:238: ba mthar thug gi yan lag lnga po rtsa ba
NK001(ka)029:239: bzhi la yod pa ltar tshang dgos kyang 'dir ni
NK001(ka)029:240: yid kyi bsdam bya tsam smos pa'o //
NK001(ka)029:241: . dag ji ltar spong ba la bslab pa'i tshul ni /
NK001(ka)029:242: . ltar spang bya lnga phyogs mthun dang bcas pa de dag yid kyis bsdam zhing /
NK001(ka)029:243: lus ngag gis slar log pa la bslab pa yin te /
NK001(ka)029:244: blang dor gyi gnas mi brjed pa'i dran pa /
NK001(ka)029:245: sgo gsum gyi bya ba la skyon yon rtog pa'i shes bzhin /
NK001(ka)029:246: lus ngag yid gsum chos bzhin lhur byed pa'i bag yod de /
NK001(ka)029:247: chos gsum la nan tan lhur byed pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa la bslab bo //
NK001(ka)029:248: gsum pa thabs la mkhas pas nyes med du 'gyur pa ni /
NK001(ka)029:249: snying brtse ldan dang byams phyir dang //
NK001(ka)029:250: sems dge ba la nyes pa med //
NK001(ka)029:252: rang don gyi 'khri ba med pa'i gzhan la phan par 'dod pa'i byams pa dang /
NK001(ka)029:253: sdug basngala bral 'dod kyi snying rjes kun nas bslang ste /
NK001(ka)029:256: gti mug med pa'i bsam pa can la yid kyi gsum mam log lta ma gtogs pa /
NK001(ka)029:257: lus nga ga gi mi dge- ba bdun po gnang ba yin te /
NK001(ka)029:258: bsam pa byang chub sems dpa' la //
NK001(ka)029:259: dge 'am yang na mi dage'anga rung //
NK001(ka)029:260: thams cad bde dge nyid du 'gyur //
NK001(ka)029:262: kun slong dge ba 'ba' zhig yin kyang /
NK001(ka)029:263: lus ngag gi sbyor ba mi dge ba ltar snang bas mi dge ba zhes btag pa'o //
NK001(ka)029:264: 'on kyang srog gcod kyi las lam rdzogs par gnang
NK001(ka)029:265: ba ni sa thob pa yan gyi dbang du byas
NK001(ka)029:266: pa'o // gsum pa nyams na phyir 'chos pa'i tshul ni /
NK001(ka)029:267: rtsa ba bzhi nyams na dge bsnyen yan chad sdom ldan gyi drung du bskyar la blang dgos shing /
NK001(ka)029:268: yan lag ma tshang ba byung na bshags bya'i nyes
NK001(ka)029:269: pa yin pas yul snga ma rnams kyi mdun du
NK001(ka)029:270: / phyag dang dgongs gsol byas nas /
NK001(ka)029:271: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba la ji ltar yongs
NK001(ka)029:272: su grags pa'i ltung ba 'di lta bu byung ba
NK001(ka)029:276: zhes lan gsum gyis bshags shing /
NK001(ka)029:277: phyogs mthun rnams ni yid kyis bsdams pas kyang chog go //
NK001(ka)029:279: sa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu pa'i mdo las /
NK001(ka)029:280: gal te rang bzhin gyi sdig pa'i rtsa ba bzhi po de bsrungs na /
NK001(ka)029:281: . ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
NK001(ka)029:282: zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi
NK001(ka)029:283: rgyu'i mchog dam pa rnam par bzhag pa yin no
NK001(ka)029:284: // . bas na chos rnam pa bzhi bsrung ba
NK001(ka)029:285: ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba zhes
NK001(ka)029:287: sa chen po 'di la brten nas rtsi shing dang /
NK001(ka)029:290: nags tshal la sogs pa thams cad skye'o //
NK001(ka)029:291: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi po
NK001(ka)029:292: 'di bsrungs pa la brten nas dge ba'i chos thams
NK001(ka)029:296: dang por bslab pa'i gzhi lnga rnams //
NK001(ka)029:297: gso sbyong sogs dang yang dag ldan //
NK001(ka)029:298: mi dge bcu ni yongs spong ba //
NK001(ka)029:299: byin nas dge bsnyen nyid du bya //
NK001(ka)029:301: dge bsnyen gyi bslab pa ni /
NK001(ka)029:302: mi dge bcu spong gi sdom pa yin pa'i phyir /
NK001(ka)029:303: sdom pa gong ma thams cad kyi gazhi'am rtsa bar gyur pa yin la /
NK001(ka)029:304: chang ni myos par 'thung ba las bag med par 'gyur te /
NK001(ka)029:305: nyes pa gzhan mtha' dag 'dren pa'i phyir bcas pa'i
NK001(ka)029:306: kha na ma tho ba rnams kyi nang nas ches
NK001(ka)029:307: lci ba yin pas sdom ldan gyi nad pas kyang
NK001(ka)029:308: rtsa rtse'i thig pa tsam yang mi 'thung bar gsungs
NK001(ka)029:309: so // . ltar yongs rdzogs dge bsnyen gyi bslab bya cha tsam bshad pa 'dis ni /
NK001(ka)029:312: phal cher spyod pa'i dge gnyen gyi bslab bya'anga shes par 'gyur zhing /
NK001(ka)029:313: yan lag lnga las log g.yem gyi dod du mi tshangs spyo.-spong ba tshangs spyod dge bsnyen dang /
NK001(ka)029:314: bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du
NK001(ka)029:315: bsrung ba go mi'i dge bsnyen du grags pa ste
NK001(ka)029:317: skyabs 'gro'i dge bsnyen gyi bslab bya ni thams cad kyi thun mong pa'o //
NK001(ka)029:321: dge slong nyid dag gis snga ma bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la phyi ma mi bya'o //
NK001(ka)029:322: zhes gsungs pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i bslab pa thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa'o //
NK001(ka)029:323: . dag las rgyas pa ni bslab bya'i bsham gyi
NK001(ka)029:324: nan tan lhur byed pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa
NK001(ka)029:325: la bslab bo // zhes pa'i bar tshang bar bshad nas dge ba bsngo bar bya'o //
NK001(ka)029:326: 'bring du na yan lag bzhi chang dang bcas lnga
NK001(ka)029:327: po spong dgos tshul mdor bsdus tsam zhig bshad nas
NK001(ka)029:328: bsngo- ba bya'o // yongs rdzogs dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa byin pa'i cho ga'o ////
NK001(ka)029:330: lha mi'i ston pa zas gtsang sras //
NK001(ka)029:331: thugs rje'i bdag nyid der btud nas //
NK001(ka)029:332: yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyen gnas kyi //
NK001(ka)029:333: cho ga mdo tsam bshad par bya //
NK001(ka)029:334: 'dir yan lag brgyad ba'i bsnyen gnas kyi cho ga sgrub pa la /
NK001(ka)029:335: len pa'i cho ga sgrub pa la /
NK001(ka)029:338: 'thad pa bshad pa dang gsum las /
NK001(ka)029:339: dang po sdom pa blang ba'i cho ga ni /
NK001(ka)029:340: dkon mchog gi rten dang mchod pa ci 'byor ba bshams pa'i drung du /
NK001(ka)029:341: slob dpon stan mtho ba la 'dug /
NK001(ka)029:344: rten dang bla ma la phyag byas nas tsog pu'am
NK001(ka)029:345: pus mo btsugs thal mo sbyar te 'khod pa la
NK001(ka)029:346: / slob dpon gyi sems bskyed gsal btab nas /
NK001(ka)029:347: dal 'byor rnyed dka' 'chi ba mi rtag pa las
NK001(ka)029:348: rgyu 'bras 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs rnams rgyas bsdus ci
NK001(ka)029:349: rigs par bshad nas blo bcos pa'am /
NK001(ka)029:350: khyod bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa len par 'dod pa de legs /
NK001(ka)029:353: rgya mtsho cher g.yengs gnya' shig bu ga dang //
NK001(ka)029:354: rus sbal 'phrad pa bas kyang dud 'gro las //
NK001(ka)029:355: mi nyid ches thob dka' bas mi dbang gis //
NK001(ka)029:356: dam chos spyad pas de 'bras mchis par mdzo. //
NK001(ka)029:358: tshe 'di gnod mang rlung gis btab pa yis //
NK001(ka)029:359: chu yi chu bur bas kyang mi rtag na //
NK001(ka)029:360: .bugs rngubs dbugs dbyung gnyid kyis log pa las //
NK001(ka)029:361: sad khom gang lags de ni ngo mtshar che //
NK001(ka)029:362: zhes gsungs pa ltar dal 'byor gyi mi lus rin
NK001(ka)029:363: po che rnyed par dka' zhing rnyed kyang yun ring
NK001(ka)029:364: du mi gnas par skad cig gis kyang 'jig pa'i
NK001(ka)029:365: chos can 'di nyid da lta cung zad tsam gnas
NK001(ka)029:366: pa'i skabs 'dir snying po longs pa zhig ci nas
NK001(ka)029:368: len thabs kyang tshogs bsags shing sgrib pa sbyang ba la rag las pa yin la /
NK001(ka)029:369: . yang tshegs chung la phan yon che ba bsnyen
NK001(ka)029:370: gnas kyi sdom pa blangs nas bsrung ba yin te
NK001(ka)029:372: gang+g+aa la sogs pa'i chu klung chen po lnga dang /
NK001(ka)029:373: rgya mtsho chen po'i chu bum pa'i grangs kyis bzung bar nus kyis /
NK001(ka)029:374: bsnyen gnas kyi phan yon gyi tshad bzung bar mi nus shing /
NK001(ka)029:375: 'dzam bu gling gang ba'i dgra bcom pa la rin
NK001(ka)029:376: po che la sogs pa'i yo byad thams cad byin
NK001(ka)029:378: bsnyen gnas kyi bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang mi 'gro /
NK001(ka)029:379: stong gi char yang mi 'gro bar gsungs shing /
NK001(ka)029:380: 'jig rten gdags pa las kyang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis /
NK001(ka)029:381: zla ba yar gyi tshes brgyad dang /
NK001(ka)029:382: cho 'phrul gyi ni zla ba la /
NK001(ka)029:383: bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad bsrung na //
NK001(ka)029:386: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa /
NK001(ka)029:387: ko'u shi ka khyod de skad ma zer cig /
NK001(ka)029:388: zla ba yar gyi tshes brgyad dang //
NK001(ka)029:391: zhes bsnyen gnas kho nas sangs rgyas thos par gsungs pas bsam pa 'di bzhin du mdzo. /
NK001(ka)029:392: . yang 'khor ba 'di na sems can thams cad
NK001(ka)029:393: gnas grogs logs spyod bya ba ci dang ci byed
NK001(ka)029:394: pa thams cad sdug basngala gyi yo lang dang sdug
NK001(ka)029:395: basngala sgrub thabs 'ba' zhig par longs spyod par 'dug
NK001(ka)029:397: . rnams sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'god bar bya /
NK001(ka)029:398: de'i ched du sangs rgyas la skyabs zhu /
NK001(ka)029:400: dge 'dun pa la lam sgrub pa'i grogs zhu snyam pas 'di'i rjes zlos mdzo. /
NK001(ka)029:402: btsun pa'am slob dpon dgongs su gsol /
NK001(ka)029:406: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba dus 'di nas bzung ste /
NK001(ka)029:409: sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o nas /
NK001(ka)029:413: sang nyi ma ma shar gyi bar du ji srid
NK001(ka)029:414: 'tsho'i bar dus bzang gsum ka la gtan len byed
NK001(ka)029:415: na / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du zla ba byung ngo cog gi tshes brgyad dang /
NK001(ka)029:417: gnam gang la bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad par zhes sbyar /
NK001(ka)029:418: bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad par slob dpon gyis bzung du gsol /
NK001(ka)029:420: gsum pa'i yan lag brgyad par zhes pa'i tshig rdzogs pa dang sdom pa thob shes bskyed cing /
NK001(ka)029:421: slob dpon gyis thabs yin no //
NK001(ka)029:422: slob mas legs so zhes barjo. /
NK001(ka)029:424: .sa khyod kyi rgyud la bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa legs par thob pa yin //
NK001(ka)029:425: ba pas mi chog bsrung dgos /
NK001(ka)029:426: de la bsnyen gnas kyi skabs su bshad pa'i bsrung bya brgyad po 'di yid kyi sgo nas spang /
NK001(ka)029:427: lus ngag gi sgo nas slar log par bye. /
NK001(ka)029:428: . yang sngon gyi 'phags pa dgra bcom pa rnams
NK001(ka)029:429: gyi rjes su 'brangs nas bsrung snyam pas 'di'i rjes
NK001(ka)029:430: zlos mdzo. / slob dpon dgongs su gsol /
NK001(ka)029:431: ji ltar sngon gyi 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gis srog gcod pa spangs te /
NK001(ka)029:432: srog gcod pa las slar log pa de bzhin du /
NK001(ka)029:433: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang /
NK001(ka)029:435: sang nyi ma ma shar gyi bar du srog gcod pa spangs te /
NK001(ka)029:436: srog gcod pa las slar log par bagyi'o //
NK001(ka)029:437: yan lag dang po 'dis bdag 'phags pa dgra bcom
NK001(ka)029:438: pa de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su slob
NK001(ka)029:441: gzhan yang sngon gyi 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gis ma byin par len pa dang /
NK001(ka)029:442: mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /
NK001(ka)029:445: bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur pa /
NK001(ka)029:455: dus ma yin pa'i kha zas spangs te /
NK001(ka)029:456: dus ma yin pa'i kha zas las slar log pa de bzhin du /
NK001(ka)029:457: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang /
NK001(ka)029:459: sang nyi ma ma shar gyi bar du ma byin par len pa dang /
NK001(ka)029:461: slar log par bagyi'o'i bar dang /
NK001(ka)029:462: yan lag brgyad pa 'dis bdag 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gi bslab pa la nas /
NK001(ka)029:463: rjes su bgyid do'i bar lan gcig barjoda nas /
NK001(ka)029:465: gnyis pa thob pa mi nyams par bsrung ba ni /
NK001(ka)029:466: bslab bya shes pa la rag las pas /
NK001(ka)029:468: gzhan du barjoda pa bzhin bshad nas /
NK001(ka)029:469: bsnyen gnas rang gi bslab bya yan lag brgyad de /
NK001(ka)029:470: . yang mi'am mir chags pa'i srog mi bcad cing srog chags phra mo la'ng mi 'tshe /
NK001(ka)029:471: gzhan gyi nor rin thang tshang bar ma zad dngos
NK001(ka)029:472: po phra mo tsam yang ma byin par mi len
NK001(ka)029:473: / mi tshangs par spyod pa lta ci tha na
NK001(ka)029:474: chags sred kyi gzhan gyi lus la reg pa'ng mi
NK001(ka)029:475: / bya / mi chos bla ma'i rdzun du ma zad rtse mo'i ched du yang rdzun mi smra /
NK001(ka)029:476: myos bar 'gyur ba'i chang thig pa gcig yan chad mi btung /
NK001(ka)029:477: gar sogs phreng sogs sdoms pas gcig ste sems rgod
NK001(ka)029:478: cing lus sgeg pas brtul zhugs nyams pa'i las mi
NK001(ka)029:479: bya / khri stan che mtho mi brten /
NK001(ka)029:480: dus ma yin pa ste phyi dro'i kha zas spong ba dang brgyad po 'di bsrung dgos shing /
NK001(ka)029:481: .ra ma zad jo bo rje'i phyag len zas dkar
NK001(ka)029:482: gsum la brten cing sha khrag gi dri tsam yang
NK001(ka)029:484: dran shes bzhin bag yod kyi slad du chab len pa sogs kyang bya bar gsungs so //
NK001(ka)029:485: . ltar spang bya rnams tshul bzhin du ma bsrung
NK001(ka)029:486: na sdom pa blangs kyang phan yon mi 'byung bar
NK001(ka)029:487: ston pa'i bcas pa dang 'gal ba'i nyes dmigs bsam
NK001(ka)029:490: gang zhig ston pa thugs rje'i bstan pa la //
NK001(ka)029:491: yang bar sems shing cung zad 'da' byed pa //
NK001(ka)029:492: . ni de las sdug basngala gzhan dbang thob //
NK001(ka)029:493: smig tshal bregs pas a mra'i tshal nyams bzhin //
NK001(ka)029:495: tshul bzhin bsrungs pa la phan yon shin tu che ste /
NK001(ka)029:498: sa skas gzhi dang 'dra bar gnas //
NK001(ka)029:500: }ra yang bshad pa bzhin phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab par dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /
NK001(ka)029:501: . yang ngo tsha khrel yod kyi bsam pa skye ba sogs dgos pa du ma dang ldan pas //
NK001(ka)029:502: ga mar slob dpon las blang bar bya zhing /
NK001(ka)029:503: bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa ni nyin zhag gi mtha' can yin pas /
NK001(ka)029:504: nang par skya rengs shar ba'i tshe sdom pa gtong
NK001(ka)029:505: ba'i phyir slar yang nam bsrung bsrung gi bar bla
NK001(ka)029:507: bla ma ma 'byor na rten gyi drung du gso
NK001(ka)029:508: sbyong rang gis blang ba'i cho ga la brten nas
NK001(ka)029:509: blangs te / dus bzang rnams la ci nus su bslab par gyis shig /
NK001(ka)029:510: ces barjoda par bka' drin dran pas phyag bya'o //
NK001(ka)029:511: gsum pa 'thad pa bshad pa ni /
NK001(ka)029:513: bsnyen gnas yan lag tshang bar ni //
NK001(ka)029:514: dang po gzhan las nod par bya //
NK001(ka)029:516: ga mar rab tu byung ba'am /
NK001(ka)029:517: khyim pa gso sbyong la gnas pa zhig la ji
NK001(ka)029:518: srid 'tsho'i bar gyi nya stong brgyad gsum ga'i bsnyen
NK001(ka)029:519: gnas kyi sdom pa dus gcig la blangs nas /
NK001(ka)029:520: . phyin chad sdom pa len yul gyi gang zag ma rnyed na /
NK001(ka)029:521: rang nyid kyis rten gyi drung du len pa yin gyi /
NK001(ka)029:522: }ra gang zag las len ma myong na rten gyi drung du blangs kyang sdom pa mi skye /
NK001(ka)029:523: }ra len myong ba dag gis kyang bsrung rgyu'i dus
NK001(ka)029:524: tshes gang yin de la rang gis rten gyi drung
NK001(ka)029:525: du blang bar bya yis ma blangs par mi rung
NK001(ka)029:526: ngo // . yang len yul las rang nyid stan mtho ba dang /
NK001(ka)029:527: dbang po ma bsdams pa dang /
NK001(ka)029:529: rjes zlos kha gcams pa dang /
NK001(ka)029:531: rgyan gsar du gdags pa rnams ni sdom pa skye ba'i gegs yin la /
NK001(ka)029:532: sang gi nyi ma shar ba /
NK001(ka)029:535: phul ba rnams ni sdom pa'i gtong rgyu'o //
NK001(ka)029:536: skye ba'i rgyu ni nges 'byung gi bsam pa'o //
NK001(ka)029:537: gnas pa'i thabs ni dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis bslab bya rnams legs par bsrung bar bya'o //
NK001(ka)029:538: sdom pa de nyid tshe gang du blangs nas bsrung
NK001(ka)029:539: ba ni slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mi ltar
NK001(ka)029:540: go mi'i dge bsnyen du 'gyur ro //
NK001(ka)029:541: . ltar gnas skabs lha mi dang //
NK001(ka)029:542: mthar thug 'bras bu byang chub gsum //
NK001(ka)029:543: sgrub byed yan lag brgyad pa yi //
NK001(ka)029:544: cho ga nyung gsal 'jug bder spel //
NK001(ka)029:545: khyim pa rjes su 'dzin pa so so thar pa'i-sdom
NK001(ka)029:546: pa'i cho ga thar lam rab gsal zhes bya ba
NK001(ka)029:547: 'di ni / nye bar gnas pa o rgyan rnam
NK001(ka)029:548: grol gyis bskul ba'i ngor sh+aakya'i dge bsnyen 'gyur med
